ma mthong na/ sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA
ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar

mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa mi rtag
ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi
sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes
bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces
bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am
smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am
'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs
ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs da ltar byung pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par
shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes

'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /de ni gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin

zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la mi spyod do/ /nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /skye ba med pa stong pa nyid dang 'gag pa
med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /sems can yongs

su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la mi spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
mi spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de bzhin

nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa ni/ chos gang la yang tha dad pa'am/ bye brag gam/ khyad par du lta ba med de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa

dang / zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mngon par shes pa dmigs pa lta ga las 'ong / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad pa rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /bsti stang du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shar

dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs
ba de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /bsti stang du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci ston pa de dag thams
cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi sngon gyi gnas bdag gis rjes su dran par bya'o/ /lha'i
mig gis sems can de dag 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes par gyur pa rnams bdag gis mthong bar bya'o/ /sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las
bzla bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud glags tshol zhing nyams bskyod pa rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed de/ 'jig
rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub pa dang / yongs su brtag pa med par mthun par 'grub bo/ /'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs
pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs
pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung du 'ong ngo zhes srung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor

dang / tshangs chen dang / snang pa dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang pa dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che
dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du
thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed

pa'i phyir ro/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung du 'ong ngo
zhes yongs su srung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams

dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang /

chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang
ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya
ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson

zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / spobs pa dang /
so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshegs mi che bar mngon du 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang 'bral bar mi
'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams la 'du ba'am
'bral bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'phrad pa'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang yang 'du ba'am 'bral bar 'gyur
pa'am/ 'phrad pa'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam
du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs
rgyas pa med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang chos kyi
dbyings dang / tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//

shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba mi byed de/ shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram 'on tam khong du chud par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos

gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do/ /de'ang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam

par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro/ /mig dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig tu mi sbyor ro/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /

yid dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid du mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos dang
stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos su mi sbyor ro/ /mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs kyi
khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes
pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid
kyi khams dang / stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /yid kyi
rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / stong pa nyid du mi
sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi sbyor ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa ste/

shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /

sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/

de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de ni rab ces bya/ mchog dang / dam pa dang / phul dang / gtso bo dang / gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/ bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byed kyang / de 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa yin no zhe'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems
so| |bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston pa mdzad do/ /bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/ /bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis ni
sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor

bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu byed pa med de/ de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am/
gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang
yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /
bdag dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i
'du shes mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te/ sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do/ /gang la skye ba dang 'gag
pa med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med
pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems
can rang bzhin med pa dang / sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal
'byor dam pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te/ des de ma
yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
mngon par bsgrub bo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub
bo| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do/ /tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems
dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir
skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes
par shes par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la/ rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste/ tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho
skyong ba de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
bu| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med
pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/ mi dang skal ba
mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang myur
du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no/ /de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang khyod kyis de skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der
'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po lnga pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag
bsam gtan bzhi po la mnyam par gzhog cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang spyod de/ de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing / gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed na'ang / de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba'ang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
bsam gtan la'ang mnyam par gzhog la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de/ de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su
skye ba'ang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/ dbang po rno ba ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po nas/ bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang
snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes
med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje chen po la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs
mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do/ /de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma bral bas/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i
skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dgra thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang
gis mi skye ba'ang yod de/ de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ khyim bdag gi
rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/ de'ang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas
skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug
cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod de/ de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
dang skal ba mnyam par bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/
de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do/ /
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /byams

pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched
dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de/ de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ /de dag de na'ang tshangs pa tshangs chen
dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na'ang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/ de dag de na 'khod cing / gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing dong
ngo| |de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi po la'ang snyoms par
'jug /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang bsgom/
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod de/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing / de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas/ dbang po ma
nyams pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes ba drug
thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ theg pa chen po ma gtogs par

nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg ba'i sgra'ang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu
med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa
drug thob pa dag /'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi
khams su 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod/ chos kyi legs pa brjod/ dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod cing / sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas/ de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye zhing / de dag tu'ang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag /dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par bzhugs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa'ang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi
'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byas nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / de dag yongs su mya ngan las
'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems
bskyed pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing
nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong ba dag
kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mar rnam par rtse
zhing / 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go /de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /'gog
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam
par gzhog go /de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /de las langs
nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /de las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
la'ang snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /de las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas 'gog
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ de las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
la mnyam par gzhog go /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang / /
tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa thob pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
kyi sgo rnams thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dang / rnam
par thar pa'i sgo gsum po thob kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
dang / rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la
ston par byed de/ sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de
dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi
gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di
ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa/ mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang | bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA
ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing / de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed cing / sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don du rtag
par brtson te/ nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra/ gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di
ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /
sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas
shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang /
bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal stan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis
yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dag kyang yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa
la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang / gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ /brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/
sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ /sems can rnams chos thams
cad la mngon par zhen pa med par 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems
can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i
klung gi bye ma snyad dag tu 'dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che
ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag

skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang
chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas
kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs
pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye po mang po dga' ba dang mos pa bskyed de/ de dag
'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag
pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba
thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag mi bstod cing gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
po sems bskyed phyin chad/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing / log
par 'go ba dang / ngan song du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma
thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god
pa dang / sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing de la gnas
nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang bkur sti
dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems
can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed cing / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
ma rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de'ang nam yang 'bral bar mi byed bdag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang

dag par byung ba yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang
yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing / 'di ni lus yin gyi des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni ngag yin gyi des
ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni yid yin gyi des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/ de ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las

rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ lus gang dang ngag gang dang yid gang gis 'jungs
pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems
bskyed pa'am/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so/ /ngag mi dmigs so/ /sems mi dmigs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du'ang shes par mi bya ste/ de ni gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag dang sems mi dmigs pa de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang
ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa mad par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar
gzhog na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang / ngag dang / yid la dmigs pa med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs
pa med pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ de ltar chos thams cad la dmigs
pa med cing / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nan tan du byed
pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang /
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba dang sgra dang / sna dang dri dang /
lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg bya dang / yid dang chos la rlom sems med pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i
khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems
med pa dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang /
ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
chos kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rlom sems med pa dang / dran pa nye
bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
rlom sems med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang | phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/ mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi
'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /de
nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na smad
par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag

kyang mthong ngo / /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /chos kyi
'du shes dang / dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed
do| |bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste/ nang
stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom
ste| mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/
ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag
par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs
su sbyong ba yod do/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i

mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang /
stong gi bar du mthong ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/ /sha'i mig gis gling gnyis dang / gling gsum
dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong
ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sum cu rtsa
gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs

chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang /

'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu shes so//
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /
mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung

snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba
dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes te/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub

dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa
gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas
sam| dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten
las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ chos gang yang ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos
pa'am/ ma bsams pa'am/ khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsal pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di
la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa

ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs snyoms pa'i
kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab
rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba
thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig
pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ /gang zag 'di ni mtshon ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma
med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ gang
zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o/ /gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pas/ 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag
ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rab tu
shas te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no/ /zhes bya bar shes pas/ dbang po lnga thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus
kyi dbang po dang ldan te/ thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin to/ /dge ba'i rtsa bas bsten pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal
rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /sum cu
rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /de
dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
dag par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti
stang dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos
kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ /'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'di ni nges pa'o/ /'di ni ma nges pa'o/ /'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur pa'o/ /'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /'di
dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste dbang thob pa'o/ /'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste dbang ma thob pa'o/ /'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su
ma rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed do/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang /byang
shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed de /'dis ni mngon par
shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni mngon par shes pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o/ /'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no/ /'di ni dbang thob pa'o/ /'di ni dbang
thob pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur
ro| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o/ /'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas
so| |'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs par brjod pa mdzad do/ /'di la ni legs par brjod pa mi mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par
'gyur ro/ /'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni ldan par mi

'gyur ro/ /'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o/ /'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/ /'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni
'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de
ltar na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi
rjes la/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa
yin| mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de ni de'i mig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig de dang ldan pas/
rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa'am/ ma shes pa'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
mig lnga yongs su spyang bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge
ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med
do| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'das par brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / mig lnga po 'di dag skyed pa'o/ /mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ni/ mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/ /de ni sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/ /
gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/ /mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do/ /rtsig pa las thal ba dang rab las thal ba dang / ri las
thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /sa la'ang
gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul bar byed de/ dper na/ chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na/ sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/
dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/ 'di ltar mthu che zhing / 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas
byugs shing / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar lus kyis dbang sgyur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis
dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma
gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no/ /de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa
mi las 'das pas/ lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong
pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang sgra dmigs pa med de/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams
la bsam pa yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon
par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po drug pa/ des sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi
sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
shes so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang
ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang med pa'i sems la zhe sdang med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /
gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems
zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa dang
bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang
bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
shes so/ /kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems

zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chung ngu'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i
sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dog pa'i sems la
dog pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshad
med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang
dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par grol ba'i sems
la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
rab tu shes so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems
zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag
pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur
ba'ang med do/ /de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang /
rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems
shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am/ sems shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no/ /de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par bsgrub ste/ sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no/ /nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma
brgya dang / zla ba gcig nas zla ba brgya dang / lo gcig nas lo brgya dang / bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma nas bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rjes su dran te/ bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun
ni 'di srid gcig tu 'dug 'dug/ tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/ che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir
skyes so zhes bya ba'i par du rnam pa dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas/ dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ de ni bdag gis rab tu shes
so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de/ 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
ye shes mi dmigs so/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bab ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no/ /de ni
lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas
pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/
'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal
