nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa
nyid| stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha
rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i
stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa
nyid| stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//
bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas
par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ yi ge mngon
par bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yi ge rnams ma lags/ yi ge rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis
te| yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon
par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes
pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang
stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
'das/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/
gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs

pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa
nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems

gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/

ste| de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang
gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag

shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid

gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang

do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben
pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang / gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs
dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
ste| de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa
nyid gang lags pa de'ang / rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe| de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
de'ang de bzhin nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos
nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos
kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos kyi dbyings
kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe| chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos
skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang / chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags/ chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag
pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis
te| yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi
'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi pa dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na/ de yang dag pa'i mtha'i mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ gzugs kyi yongs su
bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba
ma mchis pa ste/ rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes ba ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su
bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe| de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
'das/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya che ba/ phul du bgyi ba/ tshad ma mchis
pa| tshad ma mchis par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing / de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma
mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste/ mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na/ gzugs ni mtshan
ma'o| |tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o/ /'du shes ni mtshan ma'o/ /'du byed ni mtshan ma'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /mig ni mtshan ma'o/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
yid ni mtshan ma'o/ /gzugs ni mtshan ma'o/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni mtshan ma'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
dang | sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o//
rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o/ /sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang /
nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o/ /ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa

dang | tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o/ /

phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o/ /yang dag par spong
pa rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
dang | mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
ni mtshan ma'o/ /yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma'o/ /gcig tu brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /gnyis su brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o/ /tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma ste/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes
bgyi'o/ /gal te de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni/ kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi
'gyur ro/ /dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod
pa ste| de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so/ /de ltar na de ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pas
yongs su bzung ba lags te/ kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te/ de ltar zhugs
nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo / /de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs
su 'dzin pa ma dmigs te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob
par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang /
thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang /
gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
dang | rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du'ang yang dag par rjes
su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang
dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te/ de ltar mos par gyur na/ dad pa'i rjes su
'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos par gyur nas/
des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis te/ chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis/ gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs
su gzung bar bgyi ba'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su
'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
dang | stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
dang | mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'on kyang smon lam yongs
su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
dang | gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam
rnams ni smon lam ma lags/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
dang | smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs

su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig/ ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de de ltar yongs su rtog cing nye bar sems pa'i tshe/ chos gang med cing mi dmigs pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gal te de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma
mchis mi dmigs so/ /gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de
nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras

pa| tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong

pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid

dang | phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med
cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid

dang | phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
dang | rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
phyir| skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
gyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs
so| |nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa
nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med
cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa
med cing yongs su zhum pa med la/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o//
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rnam par
shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes

so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyen pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun du
zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
bar ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
dang | chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang
bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med
pa'o| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la
rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi
mtshan nyid med do/ /khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /yang
dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do/ /mtshan nyid la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/ /mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/ /
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor
gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes/ ma byung ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na chos
thams cad ma skyes/ ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs
so| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i
bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur ba de lta de ltar/ lus yongs su dag
pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang /
sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /zhe

sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan
pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan
pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang
ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi gtong bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan
pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe| thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
dang | rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi
rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes
bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes bsdug bsngal
zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces
bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med
ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar
spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
dang | rnam par thar ba rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa zhes bgyi
par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma
la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na'ang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
bus| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab
'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar
brjod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/
rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzugs la mos shing 'du
shes te byin gyis rlob/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam
par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi
'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos
shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor
ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis brlabs
pas| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya
ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mi mkhas par shes
par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
byed dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces
bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /
gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma
med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces
bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong
pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
dang | byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par
bya'o|| ||shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar skal pa yod do/ /de ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /
spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod
pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs

so| |spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos
thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gal te sems ma
zhum| kun tu ma zhum/ mi skrag/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med gnyis su byar med do/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs
pa ste| ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /smras
pa| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan
dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
yod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad

kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan

dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab
tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag par 'phags
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod

do| |phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad
yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin yod do/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//

rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin yod do/ /dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /

glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
yod do/ /zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /

snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ye shes dpa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems

gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi 'phags

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge mnyam par 'gong pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//

rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab ri ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yul las brdal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yon tan
thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing
gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nem nur rnam par sel
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /srid pa'i gzhi thams cad
rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin yod do/ /sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ /gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin yod do/ /'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma

med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa dang
bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /de bzhin nyid
la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ngag gi
skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi
sgo gang la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
lung bstan to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom
sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /bdag ni mnyam par bzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/
de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi rgyu'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni med do/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan

zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya
ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus
sam| rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab
'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i
phyir ro/ /smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ /'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa
med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de'ang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med
do| |'du shes su 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs so/ /tshig 'di ni legs
par bshad do/ /ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslab par
bya'o| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang
zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shed pa po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams
dang | rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi
dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs
med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs
pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang slob pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis
pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir med ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du
mchis pa ma lags pa de la mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma

yin no| |byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ sred pa
la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing / 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/ de dag mi shes
mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par
zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi
shes mi mthong ngo / /ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /skye mched
dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo / /de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas
'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis nas 'byung ba ma yin
no| |de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid
mi ches so/ /de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma
yin| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/

tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched dang /
khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon
par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung
ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung
ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon
par zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin
rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags
na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo po nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
gyis| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
bgyi| ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs
shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor/ de ji
snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang
gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan
la| sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gzugs kyang gzhan
la| sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi rnam par
