shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam
par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig
yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu
ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin
snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu
ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang
gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/ bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs
nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos
nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus
kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam
par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/
sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phyung po lnga po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga
po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags
pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med
pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du
bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid kyi par dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
du 'byung ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
'das/ de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phung
po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni
mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma
mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / smig
rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgra brnyan ni
dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/
sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni
'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes
pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta
bu ste| rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni mig yor lta bu'o/ /tshor ba
dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs
ni chu zla lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po
drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes
pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar
du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing dngangs pa dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal
te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'ang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i
bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang mi 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing dngangs pa dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs
mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so//
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi
gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog
ste| de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
dang | rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs
so| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi

ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes
bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs
mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par
byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi

yid la bya bas gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de
mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs smon pa med
pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben pa'i
rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
dang | smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa
med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi
rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal
ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur
ro| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam
ba dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab
tu rtog go/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi
'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi
dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i
chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya
ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi
shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig

gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/
yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra
dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid
kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid
kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid
kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid
kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis
yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes
gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang / de la gzugs mi rtag ces
bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ gzugs sdug
bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya
bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar
da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces
bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ mig mi
rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis chos ston pa dang / mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
lce dang / lus dang / yid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna
ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mngon par 'du
bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dpen zhes bya bar de mi dmigs

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya

mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg

reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med
ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid
kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus
te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig
gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug
bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
dang | rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi
'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi
zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba
med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus
te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal
zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
cing | dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par
bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par
mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung
zhing | dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su
byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des
rlom sems su byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes
bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/
phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar
yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba
dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid
de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed
do| |gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/
phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems
su byed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes
bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /
lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la
stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi
'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i
'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus
te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar

yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs
phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /sa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya
bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam
par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid
la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang /
skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya
bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag
gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye
bar bzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de
dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas
pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i
sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po
ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas
gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ni bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung
bar mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bklag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub bar mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/
'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing / mos pa med
par byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di dag ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di
ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par
'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di
skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so/ /zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di
skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag
gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes
pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus
te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis
stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis
stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang
ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/
shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /byang chub sems
dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las ldog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'doms pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi
las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /mkhan po
dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las ldog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las ldog ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar
gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyi sa mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkang lag
dang mgo bcad pa chad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod
pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig /ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las
dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi
cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba
dang | bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /
bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben
zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
dang | smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes
bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
dang | sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa
dang | zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig
gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag
pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi
rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po dag rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang
lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig
gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub la'ang tshig med/ sems can la'ang tshig med pas/
de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu zla dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sprul pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
bu'i mig la gnas med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do//
sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te
reg pa la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas
med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i
skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid
pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don
med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /

phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i
dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
dang | 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa
de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig
de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ yid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
do| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

na| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir
te| rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de
