gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du
byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas
med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i
phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
dang | bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do/ /'dus
byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/
'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang
gi mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs
kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa la
gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun
nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa dang / rnam
par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la
gnas med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs shin tu
rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /
yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag
shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed
can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang
zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do/ /rab
'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par
ma grol ba'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
do| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang /
nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe
ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og
min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan
nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad
ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang / mchis pa ma lags pa
yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa
dang | 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni chos
thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba'ang chos thams cad dngos po de dag nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa
la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /
nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi
'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i
'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa

dang | tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su
dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /ma byin par
len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta
ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor/ de dag
ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma
bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched
drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa thams cad
ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan/
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin par 'jig rten
pa'i chos gnag ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang
bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa
dang | shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di
ni| rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni
rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam
mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha'
yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga
pa'o| |de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
ni| rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar
bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po da dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
de 'dod pas bden/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye
bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnams par rtog pa dang / rna par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par
dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas
dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde pa la rnam par spyod pa/ btang
snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang /
yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa
la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du
shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung
zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du
shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/
phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/
de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
ste| de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus byas
kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/ byang
chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas
pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos
nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa
med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chan po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems can
gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa
dang | rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po
nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis ba dog pa thams cad yongs su
gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
bar bya'o/ /de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa
thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis phung po nas brtsams te/ pha
rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par
bya'o| |bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su
myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang
bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal
ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i

rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o
snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po
che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni
sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed
kyang | sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi bsgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bsgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bsgul ba'o/ /sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde
ba'i sems ni/ sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor
la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod
pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan
du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor
la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/
phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i
ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la spobs pa skyed cig /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes
pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba
dang | rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs
su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang /
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang / de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshor ba
dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar
dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba
rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /rnam
par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur
ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab
mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan
thos dang | rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la'ang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis
pas| de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems ma mchis pa
de la'ang chags pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang /
'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang
la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la
nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems
so| |smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta
bu'i sems la'ang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
dang | rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/
gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
'byung ba'ang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang zag pa med cing / khongs su
chud pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med
cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing
khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med
cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
zag pa med cing khongs su chud ba med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med
cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems
med pa'i phyir/ sems de la'ang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ der yang ma zad de/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med
do| |tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar
du med pa'ang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la
chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'ang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de
bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'ang / rnam par shes pa la
chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du
med pa'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'ang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med
do| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon
par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims bsrung ba ma
yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
la gnas shing / bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa bsgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus brtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus brtsom
mo| |sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ bsam gtan gyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan bskyed do/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can
thams cad kyi don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab bsgom mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus
pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed
cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar
bya'o| |bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
pa| bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong
pa de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin ba yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten
pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems
bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len
pa'ang mi dmigs par dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo
ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang
chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can
thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la'ang mos
pa mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yin la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /

pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro'ang myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad
med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang
dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang /
shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams
kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad de/
dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin
pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa
las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
so| |de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu
bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan
pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs
su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do//
de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang / rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs
pa| shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /
snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa
med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
ste| mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i
dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
so| |nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing / 'chad
pa dang / ston cing 'grel la/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/ bsam gtan
dang | tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/
sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod
pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to snyam du sems shing / yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /
mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan
dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi
ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i
rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa rab tu
rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa
chen po'o/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab
par bya'o zhes/ de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog
cing | sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol par byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus
mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan
dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang la/ de dag la
mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam
par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par
bzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bas shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / sdug pa dang /
mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes
mi 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dus gsum la ye shes mi 'jug pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan
pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs
dang | gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la'ang
shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub
sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi
dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / shes
rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
pas| bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs
su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa
zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi
dmigs pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming
tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi
phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs
pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni
ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i
phyir| sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying
po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang
du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di
nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can
rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis
su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i
'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs
