po byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa
nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa yongs su
gtong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog par
byed pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba
dang / bsti stang du bya ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos 'tshol zhing / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi
ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs
su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi med par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung yang / de la bar chad byed pa gang yang med pa 'di ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba
gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston cing / thog mar yang dge/ bar
du yang dge /tha mar yang dge /yi ge bzang po/ don bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di lta ste/ mdo dang dbyangs
kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung
ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang
ba'o| |de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal dang khengs pa ji ltar bsal ba
des| nam yang rigs dma' bar mi skye ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad du smras
pa de ltar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe
na| 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing / de ma yin pa tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag
kyang yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa
shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon
na mang po lta ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas
pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing / 'tshe ba med pa'i sems te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o/ /de la byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/
'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems shing /
bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/ sems can thams cad sangs
rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du de dag tu gtub cing gshags pa dang / brdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam nas/ de bzhin du sems
can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las
gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su 'tshol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /
zhes mi ngoms pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par
chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu'ang re ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi
zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar
bstan na/ sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston cing / rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas
yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi sems la smod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
byang chub la'ang 'dod pa mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog
shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom ba mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtogs par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ bslab pa
thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i
yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/ phyi
nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba'o/ /de la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa la/ de'i sems mi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'di
ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su
spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te skye ba dang / mgo bregs shing / ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang
ba gang zhe na/ dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing / de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed de/ de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang
ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa sgrub par
bya ba de dang / sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems
bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su
spang pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed
cing | 'thab mo'i sems sam/ rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o//
de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi
rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na/ 'phags pa'i
lam la lta ci smos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi/ spang bar bya'o zhes sbyong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya
ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na/ gang gi nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin
zhe na| de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa
yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ dngos por mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di
ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe
sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o/ /de la sa drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar pha
rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
dag la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i rgya mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /phyin to/ /phyin par
'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang / 'dus ma byas te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di ltar
de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar
bya'o| |'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ slong mo pa mthong na sems zhum
pa mi bskyed do/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin
pas| thog ma sems bskyed nas/ kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i/ sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug
yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag shin
tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir/ chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba
med pa de la/ rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa'i chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lta ba de yang
dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po dang / skye mched
dang / khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po dang /
skye mched dang / khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni
'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya zhe
na| de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas/ sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i
phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas/ chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i
phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas/ dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur
ba'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i
phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang
'gal bar mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/ /de lta ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon
du bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na/ de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ dge
ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la
brnyas par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang /
dbri ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta bas so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/ chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang / rtogs pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag
ba'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang zhe na/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par
'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang
zhe na| ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams
cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de la
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang zhe na/ chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par
spong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang
zhe na| bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par
bzlog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ de ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang zhe na/ khams gsum la dga'
bar sems pa med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ dbang
po drug yang dag par 'dus pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye
shes gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug gi btang snyoms te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa'o/ /de la
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ sems gcig gis sems can
thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams

kyis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang / de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing
dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba'o/
de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ de ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bsgrub pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba
gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'o/ /de la byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa gang
zhe na| stobs bcu la gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma
shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs
su sbyong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bya ba thams cad byed kyang / de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag pa'o/ /de la ji ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa/ de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing / lus yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba/ ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du
bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe
na| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji lta ji ltar smon pa de
lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud par bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ des pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste/
de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs
su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so'i yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs bas nges par bstan pa shes bar bya ba rtogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro
ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i
mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen
por skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum
tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs sngon gyi byang chub sems
dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub la sems can rnams bkod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun
sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/
de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe
na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing / sems can de dag kyang
theg pa gsum la nges par 'byung ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/ lhun be
DUR+Yar 'dug pa yin/ yal ga rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/ me tog dang / lo ma rin po che thams cad las gyur pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang / 'od bzang pos 'jig
rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'geng ba yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par
dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su
rdzogs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su
rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /
rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/ pha rol tu
phyin pa rnams la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad
med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/
rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'das te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa dgu las yongs su 'das pa nas/ sangs
rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ khyod kyis gang mang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan ba'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar
mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung ba'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'byung bar gyur pa med de/ rab
'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab
'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rab tu byang ba'i dbyings
'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/
gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gog pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
pa de ni/ gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa
nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig stong pa nyid 'byung par 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor

gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba stong pa nyid dang / sna stong pa nyid dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad
do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rna ba stong pa nyid dang / sna stong
pa nyid dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / yid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor| gang
mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
pa de ni/ sgra stong pa nyid dang / dri stong pa nyid dang / ro stong pa nyid dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / chos stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs
stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos stong pa nyid ni khams
gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /sgra
dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong
pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa

stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i
rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med
do| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rna ba'i rnam par
shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi
'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi
'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa
nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//
rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rmi lam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
de ni| sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
rmi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sprul pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /
sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med
pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung
bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa

med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/
rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar

'dod pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /phyi
nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum
nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi stong

pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/
gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye par bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum
nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams
dang | byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med
do| |rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
dang | rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum
nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid dang /
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / tshad
med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan
nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi
sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams

kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo
bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /mi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang / so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /
rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong
pa'i phyir ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod
du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ dgra
bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med
pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam
pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe
na| 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ming 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/
gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/
brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med
pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /brda stong pa nyid
ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
du gnas pa med do/ /gdags pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming

stong pa nyid ni ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /brda stong pa nyid ni brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo

nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tha snyad stong pa nyid ni tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gdags pa stong pa nyid ni gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ skye
ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang
ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab
'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams
gsum nas 'byung ba med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med par shes par bya ste/ gnas pa med pa de ni bskyod du med pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du/ theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de/ theg pa chen
po de gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar theg pa chen po
de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg
pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa med do/ /de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am/

mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /yang dag pa'i
mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
lta ste| dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang
ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma
yin| mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rab tu byang ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i
dbyings la ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa med do/ /'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings dang / rab tu byang ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog
pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i
phyir ro/ /'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab tu byang ba'i dbyings rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gog pa'i dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas
pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa
nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
