nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang
ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid
la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid

'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo
nyid rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab
'byor| de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mngon par 'du bya
ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med
pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du'ang gnas par
'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ theg pa des su'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams
cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di
ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor
ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmigs su med do/ /mtha' las 'das pas sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro
dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong pa po dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag
pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do/ /shin tu
rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ skye mched dang / khams rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang | bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam
par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag
pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag
pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med
do| |shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ skye ba med pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'gag pa
med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sngon gyi mtha' dmigs
su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ da ltar byung ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/
'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dmigs su med do/ /gang mi dmigs pas thams cad dmigs su med pa yin zhe na/ chos
kyi dbyings mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin
no| |de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pas/ de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa ni/
dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ yang
dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs pas/ bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin
no| |phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams mi dmigs pas/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phung po dang / skye mched
dang / khams dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs pas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma
yin| mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid
dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar
bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang
ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs
su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
dgra bcom pa mi dmigs pas dgra bcom pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no//
rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pas/ rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma
yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs
pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su
med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rang byang chub mi dmigs pas/ rang byang chub dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang byang chub dmigs
su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /
skye ba med pa mi dmigs pas/ skye ba med pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ skye ba med pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma
yin no/ /'gag pa med pa mi dmigs pas 'gag pa med pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'gag pa med pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs
pa'ang ma yin no/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa mi dmigs pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmigs
su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par byang ba med pa mi dmigs pas/ rnam par byang ba med pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam
par byang ba med pa dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /mngon par 'du bya ba mi dmigs pas/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med do/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
dang / de ltar byung ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pas/ 'phel ba dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| rab 'byor/ 'phel ba dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /sa dang po mi dmigs pas/ sa dang po dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor/ sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa
dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa mi dmigs pas/ sa bcu pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor| sa bcu pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /de la sa dang po ni gang / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang /
sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad
pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmigs su med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sa dang po dmigs su med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi
phyir sa bcu'i bar du dmigs su med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sa bcu'i bar du dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam
par dag pa'i phyir/ sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs
pa'ang ma yin no/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
par bya ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
po nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bcu pa'o// //
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po/ theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ lha dang /
mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
ste| ji ltar nam mkha'i sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di'ang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pas/ bcom ldan
'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste/ theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'am/ gnas pa'ang ma mchis/
sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis
la| gnas pa'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ theg pa chen po 'di la'ang 'gro ba mi dmigs/ 'ong ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di'ang dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg
pa pas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po/ theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
du ste| 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
ni| 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par
thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin
rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni lha dang / mi dang /
lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams
dang | gzugs yod pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ rab 'byor/ gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la/
bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la/ ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la/ ther
zug ma yin/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /

dang | stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /

stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa
chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med la/
dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po
yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ rigs kyi
sa'i chos dngos po med la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal

te brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po med la/ dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te rigs kyi sa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ rigs kyi sa dngos po med la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos
po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab

theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi

yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du/ sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen

lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba mi 'gyur
te| rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/
dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud cing /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs
pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab
'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med pa ma yin te/ dngos po yod pa zhig yin na ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis lham mer mi
'gyur| lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med
la dngos po ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ gzi brjid
dang | dpal gyi lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger gyur pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od
dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed snang bas rgyas par mi mdzad de/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med de/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ gal te
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar yang mi mdzad de/ rab
'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus
pa bskor bar yang nus te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med de dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig
rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa rab tu bskor ro/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor
lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yod ba zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 'da'
bar yang mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i
sems can de dag dngos po med de/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir sems can rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /yongs su
mya ngan las 'da'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes smras pa ni/ de de bzhin no/ /
rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni shar phyogs dmigs su med do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang
dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de ni shar phyogs dmigs su med do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams dmigs su med de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni ring po
ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/ gru bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang ring po ma yin/ thung du ma
yin| zlum po ma yin/ gru bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'
ni sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ le brgan ma yin/ shel dang dngul gyi mdog ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang sngon po ma

ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ba zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni 'grib pa med do/ /'phel
ba med do/ /'bri ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang 'grib pa med/ 'phel ba med/ 'bri ba med de/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes
bya'o| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa med do/ /rnam par byang ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang kun nas nyon mongs
pa med/ rnam par byang ba med de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la skye ba med do/ /
'gag pa med do/ /gnas pa med do/ /mthar thug pa med do/ /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang skye ba med do/ /
'gag pa med do/ /gnas pa med do/ /mthar thug pa med do/ /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab
'byor| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang dge ba ma yin/ mi
dge ba ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa
ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin
te| de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ shes par mi bya ba'ang ma yin/ rnam par
shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ mngon du bya ba'ang ma yin/ spang ba'ang ma yin/ sgom ba'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de 'ang
shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ shes par mi bya ba'ang ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ mngon du bya ba'ang ma yin/ spang ba'ang ma yin/
sgom pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni rnam par smin pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par smin pa'i chos
can yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang rnam par smin pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/
rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma

ma yin| zhe sdang dang ldan pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa

ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sems dang po bskyed pa med do/ /gnyis pa med do/ /gsum pa

de'ang sems dang po bskyed pa med do/ /gnyis pa med do/ /gsum pa med do/ /bzhi pa med do/ /lnga pa med do/ /drug pa med do/ /bdun pa med do/ /brgyad pa med do/ /dgu pa med do/ /sems

kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gang
nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid ni gang
nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro
ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar
yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang
gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang
'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par
'gyur ba med do/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas
par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus
ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro
ba'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs
te| 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ theg pa chen po zhes bya'o zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /de ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar
byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' yang
byang chub sems dpas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba med do/ /gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/
dgu'am/ bcu zhes bya ba med do/ /tha dad ces bya ba med do/ /de lta bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/ de la mnyam pa
dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /de la 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang / gti
mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /ming dang / ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyang mi dmigs so/ /dge ba dang / mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /kha na
ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'ang
mi dmigs so/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /skye ba dang / 'gag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang mi
dmigs so/ /de la rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang / bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang /
ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang
dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /'khor ba dang / mya ngan las
'das ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor/
'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs
pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs
pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
byed dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong
pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid
la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med
de| stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong
pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su
med do/ /stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung
ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ /stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar
mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid
kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la
da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
dang | da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus
dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam
pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ yang
dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni
sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung par mi dmigs/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci
zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar
mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam
pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi
dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar
mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs
rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/
byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar
mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs
su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya
ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
ngo| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs
shing / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/
ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam
pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par 'gyur to/ /brnyes so/ /brnyes par 'gyur ro//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad
du bsgo ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar gyur pa
med de/ rab 'byor/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang
rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus
shing khongs su chud pa de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i
sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang

snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'du zhing khongs su chung par 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi chos
dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa
dang | 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg
pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna
ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang /
sna'i rnam par shas pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin
pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa
dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred
pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa
nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye
bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams
gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / bsam
gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang /
zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa
dang / dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten
pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang
ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
'dis na/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes
bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba
med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba

med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang
gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nyer bar bzhag
pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg
pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med
pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar
na theg pa chen po dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan/ mi 'jigs
pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'ang
gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar yang byang
chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te/ gzugs kun
tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas
pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba
dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems
dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs
na| byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming
tsam du bas te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi'ang bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang
chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang / byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs
lta'ang ga la zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa lta'ang ga la zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mngon par ma
grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags
la/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma
grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams te mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ yongs su mi
'jum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ dbus su dmigs su med pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i
phyir na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems
dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes
bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams
cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su
bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i
phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/
de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba'ang / bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'
zhes bgyi ba'ang / byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzugs mngon par grub pa
lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs
ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de
skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i
phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ yongs su mi 'jum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid
mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa
dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa
dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can
med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang /
sems can rang bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so/ /dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sems can med pa'ang gzhan/ sems can
stong pa'ang gzhan/ sems can dben pa'ang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin med pa'ang gzhan zhig yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sems can med pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa
dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
so| |gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid
kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dben
pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
so| |gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba
dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzugs dang /
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir/
